comment:
I'm in the same boat as everyone right now, shocked and worried for the baby, her mum is a pathological liar, narcissist, abuser, and drug user. She will likely use this baby as a defensive weapon now. "Please don't send me to jail, I'm a new mother."

The timing is suspicious, she planned it 4 years ago she said, what happened four years ago? Wasnt Elon in the picture having a legal dispute about frozen embryos?  He must have known her plans maybe this is why he is protecting her cause she could potentially use his sperm and have a child? Why the need for frozen embryos in the first place? I bet she can't conceive naturally, all those different drugs probably fucked her body up too much so she had some eggs frozen.

Maybe her role has been severely reduced because of this new baby and not just because of the backlash as many people have reported. Shouldn't being a mother come first, the baby needs to bond with the mother for God's sake!  How on earth can she be filming AM2 right? Plus did her partner know about her plans? Will they stay together knowing she wanted a baby with or without anyone in her life it seems. Maternity leave isn't just because you have given birth, it's also for when you need to bond with the baby and take care of it during the first months/year of the baby life. Depending on where you work men can also get maternity leave, in fact some places encourage it for equality these days.

comment: I knew this was shady the moment I saw that image, I mean come the F on, who the hell is she kidding. is she posing for Johnson and Johnson, a maternity clinic or what. I had to do some sniffing around myself and discovered as well as damnitalexis  pointing out, that it isn't even her child, and because she is not dating a dude currently and ''apparently'' she cannot have kids, she decided to basically get a back ally deal by taking someone else's. I also read in an article from 2014 that her father commented saying''the couple want to have children ( JD and AH), and I read another article from the Mirror during the sun trial ,and I quote ''In her witness statement, presented to the court, Sexton claimed Heard told her that Depp wanted to start a family but she didn't want to have a baby with someone who was struggling with addiction.''. and now according to the dailymail ''A source close to Heard claimed that she welcomed the child via surrogate after being told that she would never be able to carry her own baby''. so my question is has she ever attempted having children before to know if she wasn't capable, when did she discover she was infertile,  before she met JD or after , who is this so called source, and from what it seems she is trying to paint herself a bit of a saint with the way she is wording it. I call bullshit and believe she is fully fertile, but because she is not dating a guy she has chosen an easy option, and I bet this was also encouraged by those close to her as it would raise her public profile and hopefully gain sympathy before the trial. lets not forget that she could not put in the effort to have a child the natural way, but is also leaving the kid high and dry while she goes off to film aquaman 2 because I highly doubt she will have the time to care for it. I call BS on this entire thing, and if she really is infertile, then why not just adopt, its a lot more of an honest method then just striking a deal to get a freebie.
